column5: Planned to meet up with FisheadRic this morning. He was right on time. Early actually. Good ol' Ric I always say. You can set your watch by him.  Ric never showed up.   He did call me when he woke-up around 3pm.  Sloth.  All the more Pike for me!  Anyways, had some great follows and lost one. I was about to give up when this baby hit on the 2nd last cast of the day. Great fight. It had a smallish head and large body. I figured the other pike must ridcule it for it's looks but it's mother has told it there is another pike out there who will love him all the same.  Here ya go....................   "NOT THE FACE, NOT THE FACE!"   "Hi, do I look fat? I'm putting my feedbag on?"    Muchos gracias amigos!  More to come.  Thanks for nothing FHR!  P.S.  This pic taken in WAWA ONTARIO, IS FOR SALE

Great lookin pike you caught there!  Gotta love it when it's December 14 and it's still warm enough to fish.  The long range is showing rain and warm til at least boxing day.....who needs to line up at a mall?  I'm going fishing if it's really 10C like they are saying!  Great pics and report as always snag.
Please don't ridicule the pike, they have feelings to ya know!  I actually think he's kind of cute, please tell me you got his number this time  Joey

Congrats Snag.  Thanks for the report and pics.   Nice to see a report from the islands again.    I haven't been down in a while, maybe time to go since the ice doesn't look like it will be here anytime soon.
Right on Snag - thanks for the GTA pike update!  happy holidays UF
LOVE the pic of the CN Tower pike. He's city folk LOL.
yeah now I'm jealous, thats awsome man thanks for the pics.
Wawa has a CN Tower?

Poor Ol' Ric, he prolly thinks the world of you.. and you treat him like ... dirt!  1 Small headed Pike + 1 fat body = 1 Well fed fish!  I know exactly where those spots in those pics are, and I'll be down there tomorrow to Ravish your fishery!  Did I mention? Another Great Report and pics!... and thanks for posting!
nicely done, what did u catch it on?
Maybe I'll see yah around soon again. ha ha ha  dsn
I was just in Toronto, I wsh i had known you were gonna be there!
Good on ya Snag,  Some of us are only hoping to get out again!
Nice pics, love the one w/the tower.
Nice report I think with this wacky weather you are going to have another go at it.
Nice to see some soft water action!!

1-800-IMA-FISH   Yeah, Apparently they had a deal with Webers on Hwy.11. Webers got the walkway and Wawa got the tower. Bit of a scam.   You won't come here.  It's too cold to fish naked!   clown face 14cm   Call me! PM me! London still buried under snow?
nice snag! thanks for update, seems like imma have to try sometime, maybe this weekend for sure, hehehe i know exactly where u were   , that my spot!
Nice to see you stil getting out there, this weather is crazy but I'll take it! Luv the wawa shot...
Ha, Guess again, I just blurred it!!!!  HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
toooo lateee HAHAHA
Nice gators Snag!  I'll have to get out this weekend for some before the hard water hits.  Thanks for posting.  Corn Nug
